settings.title: Settings
settings.languageDescription: Choose the display language for the application
settings.themeDescription: Choose a theme that works best for you
settings.darkModeDescription: Reduces eye strain, good for nighttime use
settings.pwaInstallDescription: Install this app on your device for offline use and better experience

about.title: About Folda-Scan
about.description: Folda-Scan is a local folder scanning tool that can monitor changes in your project folder in real-time. It supports .gitignore rules and provides project structure reporting and version management features.
about.copyright: Â© 2024 Folda-Scan Team. All rights reserved.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.description: Track the latest updates and improvements to Folda-Scan

multiThreadSupport.supported: Your browser supports multi-threaded indexing. Indexing will be faster!
multiThreadSupport.notSupported: Your browser doesn't support multi-threaded indexing. Indexing will be slower, please be patient :)

incrementalScan.supported: Your browser supports FileSystemObserver API for incremental indexing. File changes will be detected in real-time!
incrementalScan.notSupported: Your browser doesn't support FileSystemObserver API. Each index will be a full index which may be slower. We recommend using Chrome or Edge for better performance.

folderPicker.noPermission: Failed to get folder access permission
folderPicker.welcomeDescription: Please select a project folder to start scanning and monitoring
folderPicker.privacyNote: All operations are performed locally, your files will not be uploaded

homePage.learnUpdates: Learn about latest features and improvements

requirementGenerator.title: Requirement Generator
requirementGenerator.generating: Generating requirements based on the conversation, please wait...
requirementGenerator.generated: The following requirements have been generated based on the conversation. You can copy and paste them into code assistants like Cursor or GitHub Copilot:
requirementGenerator.error: Error generating requirements, please try again

scanControls.observerFallback: Note: FileSystemObserver available but not enabled, falling back to polling

versionManager.title: Versions
versionManager.backupInfo: Describe the changes in this version, e.g. 'Completed login module'
versionManager.confirmRestore: Are you sure you want to restore this version? Current unbacked changes will be lost.

resultDisplay.selectFolderPrompt: Please select a folder and click the 'Start Scan' button

statistics.title: Project Statistics
statistics.commentsHelp: Shows all comments in the project to help you understand code documentation
statistics.noComments: No comments found in the project
statistics.noFolder: Please select a project folder first
statistics.startScan: Click the "Rescan" button to start analyzing the project

codeStructure.noStructuresFound: No code structures found. Please ensure your project contains supported code files.
codeStructure.visualizationHelp: Drag nodes to adjust positions. Shows relationships between code structures.

projectConfig.title: Project Architecture Diagram
projectConfig.description: This diagram shows the project's configuration files and overall architecture
projectConfig.dragHelp: You can drag nodes, zoom the view, and click on config file nodes to view their content

docker.title: Docker
docker.selectProject: Please select a project folder first
docker.noDockerfile: No Dockerfile detected in the current project

dockerCompose.title: Docker Compose
dockerCompose.noDockerCompose: No Docker Compose file detected in the current project
dockerCompose.selectService: Select a service to view details

envFile.title: Environment Variables
envFile.selectProject: Please select a project folder first
envFile.noEnvFile: No environment files (.env) detected in the current project

codeAnalysis.title: Project Code Analysis Chart
codeAnalysis.description: This chart shows the relationships between all functions, methods, and types in the project, supporting multiple programming languages
codeAnalysis.dragHelp: You can use the left panel to filter different languages and code structure types

vectorReport.title: Vectorize Report
vectorReport.description: Get project information through natural language questions
vectorReport.placeholder: Enter your query, e.g.: 'Project architecture analysis', 'Find authentication module', or 'Locate API implementation'
vectorReport.noResult: No results yet, please submit a question first
vectorReport.enableContentMatching: Enable precise Mode (may increase processing time)
vectorReport.resultDescription: Structured Markdown text containing query, related file list, file contents, and optimization statistics
vectorReport.copyInstructions: Click the button above to copy the result, which can be directly pasted into large language models
vectorReport.testInstructions: Test how this prompt performs with the AI model
vectorReport.testComplete: The test has completed all 60 conversation rounds. Test complete. To continue, please restart the test.

optimization.title: Smart Vector Optimization
optimization.description: Through semantic vector analysis, {relevantCount} relevant resources have been precisely located from {totalCount} project files, estimated to save approximately {tokenCount} tokens for large models, improving processing efficiency by about {efficiencyFactor}x.

aiDialog.title: Code Library Dialogue
aiDialog.customInputPlaceholder: Enter your question...press Ctrl+Enter to send

knowledgeModal.title: Knowledge Base
knowledgeModal.description: Manage your knowledge entries, add, edit, and delete knowledge content.
knowledgeModal.privateNotice: Your knowledge data will only be stored locally in your browser, change device please re-import
knowledgeModal.dataSecurityPromise: Your knowledge data will only be stored locally in your browser, change device please re-import
knowledgeModal.titleImportant: Critical for vector retrieval, ensure the title accurately summarizes the core content
knowledgeModal.emptyMessage: Knowledge base is empty, start adding your first knowledge entry
knowledgeModal.deletionConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this knowledge entry?
knowledgeModal.selectOrCreateMessage: Select or create a knowledge entry to view content
knowledgeModal.zipImportSuccess: Successfully imported {total} Markdown files from ZIP
